quote: The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow.
name: Bob Marley

quote: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.
name: Christopher Morley

quote: It's sad to know I'm done. But looking back, I've got a lot of great memories.
name: Bonnie Blair

quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Never make a decision when you are upset, sad, jealous or in love.
name: Mario Teguh

quote: It's sad when someone you know becomes someone you knew.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: The word 'happy' would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.
name: Carl Jung

quote: Crying is cleansing. There's a reason for tears, happiness or sadness.
name: Dionne Warwick

quote: Depression is the inability to construct a future.
name: Rollo May

quote: First, accept sadness. Realize that without losing, winning isn't so great.
name: Alyssa Milano

quote: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: I do believe that if you haven't learnt about sadness, you cannot appreciate happiness.
name: Nana Mouskouri

quote: Nobody understands another's sorrow, and nobody another's joy.
name: Franz Schubert

quote: Don't grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
name: Rumi

quote: Affliction comes to us, not to make us sad but sober; not to make us sorry but wise.
name: H. G. Wells

quote: Nothing is more sad than the death of an illusion.
name: Arthur Koestler

quote: Red is the ultimate cure for sadness.
name: Bill Blass

quote: The rose and the thorn, and sorrow and gladness are linked together.
name: Saadi

quote: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: A sad soul can kill quicker than a germ.
name: John Steinbeck

quote: Worry never robs tomorrow of its sorrow, it only saps today of its joy.
name: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Dying is only one thing to be sad over... Living unhappily is something else.
name: Morrie Schwartz

quote: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: A teardrop on earth summons the King of heaven.
name: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: To have felt too much is to end in feeling nothing.
name: Dorothy Thompson

quote: We never taste a perfect joy; our happiest successes are mixed with sadness.
name: Pierre Corneille

quote: Our sweetest songs are those that tell of saddest thought.
name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: For all sad words of tongue and pen, The saddest are these, 'It might have been'.
name: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: Sadness is but a wall between two gardens.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: I know what I look like - a weird, sad clown puppet. I'm fine with that.
name: Rainn Wilson

quote: It is sad not to love, but it is much sadder not to be able to love.
name: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: In deep sadness there is no place for sentimentality.
name: William S. Burroughs

quote: I'm always sad to leave paradise, but I leave behind the hopes of coming again soon.
name: Irina Shayk

quote: Oh, I am very weary, Though tears no longer flow; My eyes are tired of weeping, My heart is sick of woe.
name: Anne Bronte

quote: The sad truth is that most evil is done by people who never make up their minds to be good or evil.
name: Hannah Arendt

quote: I'm not a sad person, upset the whole time, but I seem to be quite emotional.
name: Freddie Highmore

quote: The day I quit, I want people to be sad about it.
name: Gianluigi Buffon

quote: How sad it is that we give up on people who are just like us.
name: Fred Rogers

quote: Tears are the summer showers to the soul.
name: Alfred Austin

quote: Sadness is also a kind of defence.
name: Ivo Andric

quote: Everything takes me longer than I expect. It's the sad truth about life.
name: Donna Tartt

quote: It's just sad that one's attitude is always speculated, even if you've not done something.
name: Karan Patel

quote: There is no sadder sight than a young pessimist.
name: Mark Twain

quote: It's sad, actually, because my anxiety keeps me from enjoying things as much as I should at this age.
name: Amanda Seyfried

quote: I love sad. Sadness makes you feel more than anything.
name: Jeff Ament

quote: Things that I feel really sad about, I talk about. That way, if it's funny, it doesn't hurt anymore.
name: Pete Davidson

quote: Tears are nature's lotion for the eyes. The eyes see better for being washed by them.
name: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: I love sad songs. They say so much. I love country music but even the happy songs sound really sad.
name: Beth Ditto

quote: The sad thing about artificial intelligence is that it lacks artifice and therefore intelligence.
name: Jean Baudrillard

quote: There is still so much drama in my life, but I'm not a sad person anymore.
name: Nikki Reed

quote: I was sad and in a dark place, and I turned to a hobby to sort of take me out of that.
name: Cole Sprouse

quote: The sad souls of those who lived without blame and without praise.
name: Dante Alighieri

quote: It's hard to watch your life unfold, and sad. Life changes.
name: Cilla Black

quote: It's sad that arts are not part of the curriculum across the nation.
name: Rosie Perez

quote: It's okay to be sad if things don't go the way you had hoped.
name: Jessie James Decker

quote: Delicious tears! The heart's own dew.
name: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quote: If you don't know about pain and trouble, you're in sad shape. They make you appreciate life.
name: Evel Knievel

quote: He who is not just is severe, he who is not wise is sad.
name: Voltaire

quote: Those who don't know how to weep with their whole heart, don't know how to laugh either.
name: Golda Meir

quote: The sad duty of politics is to establish justice in a sinful world.
name: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: We never taste happiness in perfection, our most fortunate successes are mixed with sadness.
name: Pierre Corneille

quote: The display of grief makes more demands than grief itself. How few men are sad in their own company.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: My natural disposition is pretty joyful, but you know, I have bad days and sad moments like anybody else.
name: Tracee Ellis Ross

quote: Women get the attention when we get into the men's arena, and that's sad.
name: Billie Jean King

quote: Certain emotions just take you to the notes - being furious, heroic, sad, erotic, when rain comes.
name: Jeff Buckley

quote: Better by far you should forget and smile that you should remember and be sad.
name: Christina Rossetti

quote: The excursion is the same when you go looking for your sorrow as when you go looking for your joy.
name: Eudora Welty

quote: Even when I'm in quite a happy state of mind, I like writing really sad songs. I think a lot of people do.
name: Ellie Goulding

quote: I've always had a hard time just being angry or just being really sad - the bigger emotions.
name: Briga Heelan

quote: The sad fact is that horrendous human conflict is nothing new.
name: Peter Maurer

quote: We can feel sad, hurt, demoralized. But we can't give up.
name: Patrisse Cullors

quote: I know a lot of sad people who aren't comedians.
name: Gene Wilder

quote: Lotus's efforts around the Mac were pathetically unsuccessful, which is sad.
name: Mitch Kapor

quote: Being single is only sad if you have a problem with your own company. I'm content with mine.
name: Olga Kurylenko

quote: It sounds a bit sad, but my new hobby is knitting. I love it. I find it really relaxing.
name: Ella Henderson

quote: I hold the world but as the world, Gratiano; A stage where every man must play a part, And mine is a sad one.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: I had rather have a fool to make me merry than experience to make me sad and to travel for it too!
name: William Shakespeare

quote: It is a very sad thing that nowadays there is so little useless information.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: The sad truth is that opportunity doesn't knock twice.
name: Gloria Estefan

quote: The sad truth is that excellence makes people nervous.
name: Shana Alexander

quote: I don't like people around me sad. I like making people happy.
name: Tyler, The Creator

quote: And in real life endings aren't always neat, whether they're happy endings, or whether they're sad endings.
name: Stephen King

quote: I was a sad kid.
name: Post Malone

quote: He is a hard man who is only just, and a sad one who is only wise.
name: Voltaire

quote: One must not let oneself be overwhelmed by sadness.
name: Jackie Kennedy

quote: It's a sad and stupid thing to have to proclaim yourself a revolutionary just to be a decent man.
name: David Harris

quote: The day you think there is no improvements to be made is a sad one for any player.
name: Lionel Messi

quote: The keenest sorrow is to recognize ourselves as the sole cause of all our adversities.
name: Sophocles

quote: A marriage is no amusement but a solemn act, and generally a sad one.
name: Queen Victoria

quote: However, we might oppose it, abortion is a sad feature of modern life.
name: Robert Casey

quote: Every life has a measure of sorrow, and sometimes this is what awakens us.
name: Steven Tyler

quote: Can I see another's woe, and not be in sorrow too? Can I see another's grief, and not seek for kind relief?
name: William Blake

quote: I have the choice of being constantly active and happy or introspectively passive and sad.
name: Sylvia Plath

quote: Whenever I am feeling happy or sad, I always find comfort in food.
name: Rachel Hollis

quote: I love music videos, I really do. I think it's kind of sad that it's a dying art form.
name: Adam Levine

quote: It doesn't hurt to feel sad from time to time.
name: Willie Nelson

quote: I think social media has taken over for our generation. It's a big part of our lives, and it's kind of sad.
name: Kendall Jenner

quote: It's sad that we never get trained to leave assumptions behind.
name: Sebastian Thrun

quote: Morality comes with the sad wisdom of age, when the sense of curiosity has withered.
name: Graham Greene

quote: Sometimes I wonder if suicides aren't in fact sad guardians of the meaning of life.
name: Vaclav Havel

quote: I don't have many sad days.
name: Billy Graham

quote: I can't grow a mustache. It's pretty sad if I attempt to.
name: Ashton Kutcher

quote: Sad things happen. They do. But we don't need to live sad forever.
name: Mattie Stepanek

quote: It doesn't help to contemplate how sad your life is. You have to move on.
name: Teri Garr

quote: It's fun to sing sad songs. And it's fun to listen to sad songs. Enjoyable. Satisfying. Something.
name: Richard Thompson

quote: I think I drift toward sad love songs.
name: Benmont Tench

quote: War is very sad and small life is pathetically fragile at times.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: The history of apartheid-era South Africa is incredibly sad and at times infuriatingly incomprehensible.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: It's sad when girls think they don't have anything going on except being pretty.
name: Keri Russell

quote: I find everything in life a little bit sad, but I also find a great deal of hope everywhere I look.
name: David Lowery

quote: Of these years nought remains in memory but the sad feeling that we have advanced and only grown older.
name: Max Muller

quote: The old know what they want; the young are sad and bewildered.
name: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: Fashion is that thing that saved me from being sad.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: It's a sad man my friend who's livin' in his own skin and can't stand the company.
name: Bruce Springsteen

quote: They say geniuses mostly have great mothers. They mostly have sad fates.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Proud people breed sad sorrows for themselves.
name: Emily Bronte

quote: Absence from whom we love is worse than death, and frustrates hope severer than despair.
name: William Cowper

quote: Words are less needful to sorrow than to joy.
name: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: Sad Patience, too near neighbour to despair.
name: Matthew Arnold

quote: It's very simple, I just tell my sad story, and people weep.
name: Corazon Aquino

quote: Beauty makes idiots sad and wise men merry.
name: George Jean Nathan

quote: I work extremely hard to stay positive and happy. But I get sad and anxious, too, just like everyone.
name: Rachel Platten

quote: I like to be sad once in a while. You need it for your equilibrium.
name: Marjane Satrapi

quote: One should either be sad or joyful. Contentment is a warm sty for eaters and sleepers.
name: Eugene O'Neill

quote: Those who gave away their wings are sad not to see them fly.
name: Antonio Porchia

quote: It is sad to see a woman sacrificing the ties of the affections even to do good.
name: Maria Mitchell

quote: There are so many things in life that make you sad, you have to be happy.
name: Paul Pogba

quote: I think you have to know how you feel when you're sad and it's healthy to mourn if a relationship ends.
name: Leighton Meester

quote: There are times when I'm really happy and I write something really sad, and vice versa.
name: Juan Gabriel

quote: Everything's complicated, even those things that seem flat in their bleakness or sadness.
name: Nick Hornby

quote: If I'm laughing, you know I'm either very happy or very sad. I cope with things with jokes.
name: Cristela Alonzo

quote: I was a very sad little girl.
name: Julie Andrews

quote: In this world, full often, our joys are only the tender shadows which our sorrows cast.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: It's sad, something coming to an end. It cracks you open, in a way - cracks you open to feeling.
name: Jennifer Aniston

quote: It is a sad thing when men have neither the wit to speak well nor the judgment to hold their tongues.
name: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: One of the sad truths about leadership is that, the higher up the ladder you travel, the less you know.
name: Margaret Heffernan

quote: If a man does not control his temper, it is a sad admission that he is not in control of his thoughts.
name: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: Being on your own would be sad, sick and weird. I don't trust myself. I need that balance.
name: Daniel Craig

quote: Everyone feels sad occasionally. A full range of emotions is part of what makes us human.
name: Michael Greger

quote: I'm so grounded, it's sad.
name: Patti LaBelle

quote: Good humor is the health of the soul, sadness is its poison.
name: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: It feels really sad, to me, to go to a dark bedroom. It's like surrendering to the night or something.
name: James Franco

quote: My mother and father were very strange people. They tried to be funny which is always very sad to me.
name: Jonathan Winters

quote: Well, darkness with humor... I'm not an extremely suicidal or sad person.
name: Peter Steele

quote: It makes me so desperately sad to witness just how unforgivably wretched our world has become.
name: Ralph Steadman

quote: Whether it's something happy or sad, I like to share everything with my mother.
name: Karishma Tanna

quote: Let us remember that sorrow alone is the creator of great things.
name: Ernest Renan

quote: Do not make best friends with a melancholy sad soul. They always are heavily loaded, and you must bear half.
name: Francois Fenelon

quote: I think love's exciting and happy, as well as being able to make you sad.
name: Billy Idol

quote: When I see people sad, I'm sad.
name: Anne-Marie

quote: Gun violence and social justice are near and dear to my heart. And they are so connected it's sad.
name: Jason Winston George

quote: We all go through sad times, but I was brought up to be positive.
name: Jess Glynne

quote: Life is sad. People, you know, are going to pass, and you know that you will one day.
name: James Mercer

quote: Without strenuous preplanning, road food is almost always bad food, sad food, chain food, clown food.
name: Jonathan Miles

quote: I'm not sad about any of my life. It's so unconventional. It doesn't look anything like I thought it would.
name: Edie Falco

quote: Most of the time, we keep looking outside and feeling sad about what others have. Those are mere excuses.
name: Yami Gautam

quote: You know how sad your life is when you know the release date of DVDs.
name: Heston Blumenthal

quote: We cook for so many reasons. We cook when we're sad; we cook when we're happy.
name: Gina Neely

quote: When sparrows build and the leaves break forth, My old sorrow wakes and cries.
name: Jean Ingelow

quote: I eat my feelings - when I'm happy, when I'm sad.
name: Chrissy Metz

quote: It's sad and upsetting when you see somebody crying hysterically, but at the same time it's real funny.
name: Seth Green

quote: All my work shares a kind of balance between black comedy and sad and despairing melancholy.
name: Martin McDonagh

quote: It makes me sad there is still some intellectual snobbery out there.
name: Steve Easterbrook

quote: Life can be challenging and sad... but music is the easy part.
name: St. Vincent

quote: It's sad that you don't see drivers being real people.
name: Jacques Villeneuve

quote: I think I have a dark view of the world. I have to make everything funny, otherwise it all seems so sad.
name: Moon Unit Zappa

quote: It's a sad day when a woman being funny and interested in science is considered newsworthy.
name: Elise Andrew

quote: It would be sad if we lost our instinct and our courage to love and protect.
name: Emeli Sande

quote: It always made me sad that there were kids who didn't have homes.
name: Lauren Holly

quote: It's sad when you say a $30 million film is an inexpensive film, but it is.
name: Sandra Bullock

quote: I'm not tired of who I am. That would be sad!
name: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: Ninety percent of people who lose weight gain it back. It's very sad.
name: Richard Simmons

quote: When DVDs finally disappear, I'm going to be sad. I'll miss the commentaries.
name: Matt Groening

quote: Christmas makes everything twice as sad.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: It's sad how people want to see us females go against each other. Never been for that. Never will.
name: Ciara

quote: Well, you know, too much democracy is a sort of sad thing.
name: Ann Richards

quote: The sad fact is that spending rises every year, no matter what people want or say they want.
name: Ben Stein

quote: His death was the first time that Ed Wynn ever made anyone sad.
name: Red Skelton

quote: I don't know who would not classify themselves as a romantic. I think that would be sort of sad.
name: Natalie Portman

quote: Poverty makes you sad as well as wise.
name: Bertolt Brecht

quote: When I talk about sad things, I talk about sad things.
name: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: It's sad that some people who have one exciting moment spend the rest of their lives rehashing it.
name: Jonathan Kozol

quote: The sad truth is that most of my husbands turned out to be convincing liars.
name: Joan Collins

quote: I will be very sad and worried if the imperialist government was calling me a great democratic man.
name: Hugo Chavez

quote: I think it is really sad that when people lose their homes they kind of lose their minds too.
name: Margaret Cho

quote: It's actually sad to be rich.
name: Masayoshi Son

quote: I had sadness for breakfast.
name: Andy Milonakis

quote: It's so sad, actually, how teachers and parents tell their kids, 'You're never gonna be anything.'
name: Solange Knowles

quote: We tell our triumphs to the crowds, but our own hearts are the sole confidants of our sorrows.
name: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: This is a sick business. It's so sad.
name: Sia

quote: I've got to be high class... Which is sad, because I like bars.
name: Daniel Craig

quote: I fear that I won't work in the theatre again. I'm sad about that. But I won't retire.
name: Maggie Smith

quote: I'm not sad at all about turning 40.
name: Halle Berry

quote: Sorrows are like thunderclouds, in the distance they look black, over our heads scarcely gray.
name: Jean Paul

quote: What makes old age so sad is not that our joys but our hopes cease.
name: Jean Paul

quote: I don't ever want to be sad about my life.
name: Tammy Duckworth

quote: Atari is a very sad story.
name: Steve Wozniak

quote: Whenever the lion fish in the fish tank in the captain's ready room died it was always a sad moment.
name: Patrick Stewart

quote: This Olympics is almost a little sad. It is my final Olympics. There are a lot of good memories.
name: Bonnie Blair

quote: I have a piece of great and sad news to tell you: I am dead.
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: It's a sad state when more people retweet than buy records.
name: Noel Gallagher

quote: I'm convinced I got signed because of who I am. And it makes me sad.
name: Jeff Buckley

quote: I'm convinced part of the reason I got signed is because of who I am, and it makes me sad.
name: Jeff Buckley

quote: I want to be a voice people listen to and feel good or sad or whatever.
name: Jorja Smith

quote: I'll always be sad that my marriage ended.
name: Shania Twain

quote: Cancer is a very sad thing, but you can always take something from every experience.
name: Pierce Brosnan

quote: I feel sad when I realize how much truth is being changed or obscured in the American media.
name: Sharon Stone

quote: It's really a sad story, and I liked that. The songs on this album talk about relationships in every aspect.
name: Aaliyah

quote: You want people to feel something when you tell a story, whether they feel happy or whether they feel sad.
name: Harry Dean Stanton

quote: I was singing the blues when I was six. Kind of sad, eh?
name: Harry Dean Stanton

quote: I never want to go out wearing something sad.
name: Alessandro Michele

quote: There's a lot of insecure, sad people in any profession.
name: Martin Short

quote: So few people read poetry. That's sad, isn't it?
name: Jerry Hall

quote: I'm very free with all my emotions, whether it's happy, sad, mad, glad, whatever.
name: Kimberly Elise

quote: I think that's very sad, that I haven't allowed my heart to be broken. I have broken a few.
name: Sally Field

quote: My childhood, I would say, was a bit sad.
name: Columba Bush

quote: My childhood, I would say, was a bit sad. Society resents that.
name: Columba Bush

quote: The saddest thing that befalls a soul is when it loses faith in God and woman.
name: Alexander Smith

quote: Your joys and sorrows. You can never tell them. You cheapen the inside of yourself if you do tell them.
name: Greta Garbo

quote: A lot of sad stories in a row - that wears on you.
name: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: I love curves; I'm all about curves. I don't have many, which is really sad, but I think the more the better.
name: Cara Delevingne

quote: I think about my father and how sad it was that he never had grandchildren.
name: Cate Blanchett

quote: I had a daughter and lost her a long while ago. That's too sad a story to go into.
name: Gene Wilder

quote: Nobody wants to hear R&B. It's sad. If you want to be on the radio you got to stay young.
name: Jamie Foxx

quote: It is sad to grow old but nice to ripen.
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: It's a sad day in this country when you can't talk about law and order unless they want to call you a racist.
name: George Wallace

quote: I can't deal with waking up and being sad.
name: Adwoa Aboah

quote: School was unbelievably painful. It was five years of being pretty sad.
name: Adwoa Aboah

quote: Lately, I've been a little sad that I'm not a gay man.
name: Gina Gershon

quote: Don't eat because you're angry, bored, sad, or stressed.
name: John Rampton

quote: I'm sad that it's uncool or offensive to talk about environmental or human rights issues.
name: Grimes

quote: Watching an entrepreneur fail is sad, but watching him fail from lack of nerve is tragic.
name: Steve Blank

quote: I certainly feel sad about the alienation from my son.
name: Harold Pinter

quote: It's sad when people break up.
name: Pete Townshend

quote: You mustn't smile when you lose. You have to be sad like other people. You have to win every game.
name: Eden Hazard

quote: Everybody likes Johnny Cash. I think the sad part of it is his health is givin' him problems.
name: Merle Haggard

quote: It's the sad thing about entertainment, it's not always about who is the best.
name: Jake Roberts

quote: It's a sad commentary when I have to say that sometimes in our country we are real sensitive to race.
name: Oscar Robertson

quote: I used to like to make myself sad, so I would listen to Bill Callahan as Smog.
name: Gillian Jacobs

quote: 'Dancing on My Own' is actually a really sad song! It has totally made me cry.
name: Gillian Jacobs

quote: The sad pattern of lack of trust in God has persisted since the Creation.
name: Henry B. Eyring

quote: I can't really have any friends. It's sad, really. It's lonely. But that's how I am.
name: Randy Moss

quote: I don't know if my work is a concerted effort to make kids sad!
name: Patricia Polacco

quote: The day I am not able to fly will be a sad day for me.
name: Ratan Tata

quote: When I was at Upright Citizens Brigade, I would pretend to be a sad, drunk rapper.
name: Bobby Moynihan

quote: I don't have any problem with being the guy whose album people put on when they're feeling sad.
name: Sam Smith

quote: I end up doing selfies 'cause I am so sad.
name: Rita Ora

quote: I think I would be very sad if I wasn't able to have a baby.
name: Nicole Kidman

quote: If I write a sad song, at the end it's gotta be like, 'Dude, things are looking up!'
name: Andy Grammer

quote: I don't consider myself a celebrity. That would be kind of sad.
name: Adam Driver

quote: Though I know he loves me, tonight my heart is sad; his kiss was not so wonderful as all the dreams I had.
name: Sara Teasdale

quote: I'm proud of my invention, but I'm sad that it is used by terrorists.
name: Mikhail Kalashnikov

quote: I still really like newspapers. I'm gonna feel really sad when they go. Or not - maybe I'll be dead.
name: Michael Keaton

quote: To complain now would be kind of sad. I like the way things are going.
name: Josh Brolin

quote: Actually, the moment of victory is wonderful, but also sad. It means that your trip is ended.
name: Bill Toomey

quote: Next to a lost battle, nothing is so sad as a battle that has been won.
name: Duke of Wellington

quote: Sad old blokes, I'm told, now dream of me with a whip in hand.
name: Anne Robinson

quote: It's cool to be in your feelings, and it's cool to be sad, and it's cool to feel all of these things.
name: Cuco

quote: Radical individualism can be very sad.
name: Blase J. Cupich

quote: I find America falling in love with a TV show flattering and interesting, but at the same time a little sad.
name: David Schwimmer

quote: When I'm a bit sad, I often go for a drive in the country, quite fast with my music up.
name: Calvin Harris

quote: Football is a sad game.
name: George Best

quote: In my kids' school, the married family is an anomaly... which I do think is sad. I do believe in marriage.
name: Marcia Gay Harden

quote: People just get kicks out of making other people sad.
name: Maisie Williams

quote: It would be a sad day if we British stopped being cynical, but you sometimes wonder whether we overdo it.
name: Boris Johnson

quote: I'm more apt to cry at something beautiful than at something sad.
name: Teller

quote: It's really easy to do sad; you just put on some sad music and write dramatically - everybody can do that.
name: Jill Soloway

quote: Dwight is a sad clown. You've seen those paintings of sad clown.
name: Rainn Wilson

quote: I write about heartbreak because I like writing about sad things, but I'm writing happy songs, too!
name: Jackie Evancho

quote: When I need to cry, I think of very sad things, mostly about animals.
name: Quvenzhane Wallis

quote: I live on a train. I know - what a sad thing to admit. I am the New-Age Willy Loman. But there it is.
name: Christopher Buckley

quote: But probably my favorite music, believe it or not, is sad music.
name: Walton Goggins

quote: Los Angeles can be a really sad city.
name: Adam Lambert

quote: It's a sad day when Republicans will attack fellow Republicans on an issue as fundamental as free enterprise.
name: Doug Ducey

quote: When I first started writing, I wrote really sad, emotional songs which were all slow.
name: Anne-Marie

quote: I enjoyed in every way my 12 years of playing Archie, and I wasn't personally sad about finishing a long job.
name: Carroll O'Connor

quote: The trick of 'Up' was to balance the sad stuff with the silly stuff.
name: Bob Peterson

quote: When I write, it's to heal. It's my own self-therapy so that I don't actually feel sad all of the time.
name: Sharon Van Etten

quote: I know for works for me - those wonderful sad love songs.
name: Toni Braxton

quote: I've been getting into Nick Drake lately, the folk singer. Sad, gorgeous stuff.
name: Anthony Doerr

quote: You are validating someone's life by telling their story. Even if it's a sad one.
name: Alex Tizon

quote: The sad truth is that many behavioral economists know very little about psychology.
name: Richard Thaler

quote: I don't know how the poor farmers deal with such situations in real life. It's really sad.
name: Sanjay Dutt

quote: It's a sad thing to contemplate, but I'm the last surviving cast member of 'The African Queen.'
name: Theodore Bikel

quote: I am not a sad clown. I am not a sad clown.
name: Nathan Lane

quote: The funny thing is I'm not bothered or sad about being on my own - after all I've never had a husband.
name: Francesca Annis

quote: I'm not bothered or sad about being on my own - after all, I've never had a husband.
name: Francesca Annis

quote: I've always been drawn to Marilyn Monroe, but certain aspects of her story may be too sad to tell.
name: Sherilyn Fenn

quote: What I am sad about is that there is now, in America, no equivalent to the art circuit.
name: Richard Attenborough

quote: When I went to college, my mum was really sad, so she preserved my bedroom, like a weird time capsule.
name: Gia Coppola

quote: There is something sad about clothes laid in a tomb of trunks.
name: Suzy Menkes

quote: I'm sad to say that stardom is a commodity in our culture.
name: Christine Baranski

quote: I started balding at age 17 and after first being sad, I really embraced it.
name: Jason Alexander

quote: In Mississippi, you don't admit that you're gay. It's just an awkward thing down South, which is sad.
name: Lance Bass

quote: Anytime a curtain closes forever, that's always sad news.
name: Gennady Golovkin

quote: I'm always sad to see a relationship not work, but what happens between two people is not my business.
name: Debbie Reynolds

quote: I have a stepladder. It's a very nice stepladder but it's sad that I never knew my real ladder.
name: Craig Charles

quote: Whenever I'm sad, I just put on 'SpongeBob' and I cheer up.
name: Richard Harmon

quote: When we're sad, we slouch. We also slouch when we feel scared or powerless.
name: Amy Cuddy

quote: I feel like when I say something sad, I mean it.
name: Kurt Vile

quote: I didn't like who I was. I spent a lot of my life regretting who I was, which is a sad thing to say.
name: Chris Gethard

quote: A lot of my characters are underdogs or sad or lonely, but I had a comfortable, golden sort of childhood.
name: Anthony Browne

quote: You get used to sadness, growing up in the mountains, I guess.
name: Loretta Lynn

quote: It's sad, the lottery. Good projects get funded by it, but there's an air of desperation about it.
name: Nina Conti

quote: I never was a great Thatcher fan, and it wasn't a sad day in my life when she resigned.
name: Jim Broadbent

quote: It's so sad: anything that has to do with God, people want to dispel.
name: Sylvia Browne

quote: Change is good, but in the middle of it, it can be very sad.
name: Astrid S

quote: With out art, without communicating, we wouldn't live beyond 30 because we'd be so sad and depressed.
name: Wayne Coyne

quote: Well, you can't be depressed and sad 24 hours a day.
name: Julia Sweeney

quote: When I was leaving I kind of felt a little bit sad, because I made some friends down in skid row.
name: Pras Michel

quote: Tears are the natural penalties of pleasure. It is a law that we should pay for all that we enjoy.
name: William Gilmore Simms
